data.comment: 11353 spectators have come along to Rostov Arena today.
The big names in today's match at Rostov Arena have now been confirmed.
The first-half is just kicking off.
In the minute 1, Ural Yekaterinburg needs to be cautious. Rostov have an attacking throw-in.
Ural Yekaterinburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Rostov in their own half.
In the minute 4, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Rostov.
Throw-in for Rostov in the half of Ural Yekaterinburg.
In the minute 6, Ball safe as Ural Yekaterinburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
In the minute 7, Ural Yekaterinburg to take a throw-in in Rostov territory.
Rostov awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a Ural Yekaterinburg throw-in in Rostov's half.
In the minute 10, Rostov awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg in the half of Rostov.
Throw-in for Rostov at Rostov Arena.
In the minute 13, Free kick Rostov.
Throw-in high up the field for Rostov in Rostov-on-Don.
Corner awarded to Rostov.
In the minute 15, Rostov's Evgeni Chernov is on target but unsuccessful.
Can Rostov get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg's half?
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 15, Can Rostov get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg's half?
Goal kick for Ural Yekaterinburg at Rostov Arena.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg, close to Rostov's area.
In the minute 18, Throw-in Rostov.
Rostov are coming forward and Mathias Normann gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ural Yekaterinburg have a goal kick.
In the minute 21, Ural Yekaterinburg have been awarded a corner by Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin.
Rostov drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in Rostov.
In the minute 23, In Rostov-on-Don a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
The match at Rostov Arena has been interrupted briefly for a check on Igor Kalinin, who is down injured.
In the minute 24, Yuriy Matveev (Ural Yekaterinburg) is making a first change, with Nikolay Zolotov replacing the possibly injured Igor Kalinin.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Rostov in their own half.
In the minute 29, Rostov are pushing forward but Danil Glebov's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rostov-on-Don.
Corner awarded to Rostov.
In the minute 31, Roman Eremenko of Rostov gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Ural Yekaterinburg goal kick.
Ural Yekaterinburg have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 33, Rostov have been awarded a corner by Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin.
Throw-in for Rostov at Rostov Arena.
Throw-in for Rostov close to the penalty box.
In the minute 35, Rostov have been awarded a corner by Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin.
Corner awarded to Rostov.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin awards Rostov a goal kick.
In the minute 38, Rostov have been awarded a corner by Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin.
Ball goes out of play for a Ural Yekaterinburg goal kick.
Rostov awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 41, Free kick for Rostov in their own half.
Rostov's Roman Eremenko misses with an attempt on goal.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin awards Ural Yekaterinburg a goal kick.
In the minute 43, Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Rostov just outside Ural Yekaterinburg's area.
Roman Eremenko of Rostov gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Ural Yekaterinburg at Rostov Arena.
In the minute 44, Free kick Ural Yekaterinburg.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Ural Yekaterinburg's Vladimir Rykov looks ok and returns to the pitch.
The first half has been concluded at Rostov Arena.
Attention is being given to Ural Yekaterinburgâ€™s Vladimir Rykov and play has been suspended briefly.
The second-half is underway in Rostov-on-Don.
In the minute 46, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Mathias Normann for Rostov who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Rostov have a goal kick.
Valeri Karpin (Rostov) has taken off Mathias Normann who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Kento Hashimoto is the replacement.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Rostov in the half of Ural Yekaterinburg.
In the minute 52, Denys Kulakov (Ural Yekaterinburg) has received a first yellow card.
Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg close to the penalty box.
In the minute 54, Ural Yekaterinburg are pushing forward but Vladimir Rykov's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rostov-on-Don.
Throw-in for Rostov in the half of Ural Yekaterinburg.
In the minute 57, Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin awards Ural Yekaterinburg a goal kick.
Can Ural Yekaterinburg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Rostov's half?
Corner awarded to Rostov.
In the minute 59, Rostov take a 1-0 lead thanks to Kento Hashimoto.
Rostov have been awarded a corner by Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin.
Rostov's Khoren Bayramyan gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Ural Yekaterinburg defender.
In the minute 62, Roman Eremenko (Rostov) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In Rostov-on-Don a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Alexey Ionov for Rostov gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rostov-on-Don.
Roman Emeljanov is replacing Rafal Augustyniak for the away team.
In the minute 63, Aleksey Evseev is on a sub for Yuri Bavin for Ural Yekaterinburg.
In the minute 64, Ball safe as Ural Yekaterinburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Rostov awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Rostov in their own half.
In the minute 65, Rostov awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rostov have a dangerous throw-in.
Rostov's Kento Hashimoto misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 66, Ball goes out of play for a Ural Yekaterinburg goal kick.
Rostov pushes forward through Evgeni Chernov, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Rostov.
In the minute 68, Rostov's Danil Glebov gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Ural Yekaterinburg at Rostov Arena.
Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg close to the penalty box.
In the minute 69, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Rostov-on-Don Ural Yekaterinburg attack through Aleksey Evseev. The finish is off target, however.
Rostov have a goal kick.
In the minute 70, The home team replace Eldor Shomurodov with Dmitri Poloz.
Valeri Karpin (Rostov) is making a third substitution, with Aleksandr Smirnov replacing Khoren Bayramyan.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a Rostov throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg's half.
In the minute 72, Rostov to take a throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg territory.
Rostov have been awarded a corner by Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin.
Corner awarded to Rostov.
In the minute 74, Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin awards the home team a throw-in.
Ural Yekaterinburg push forward at Rostov Arena and Aleksey Evseev gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Rostov defence.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rostov-on-Don.
In the minute 76, Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Rostov in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Rostov goal kick.
In the minute 77, Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Rostov in their own half.
Ural Yekaterinburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Andrey Egorychev of Ural Yekaterinburg smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 80, Ball safe as Ural Yekaterinburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Rostov make their fourth substitution with Arseni Logashov replacing Roman Eremenko.
Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg in the half of Rostov.
In the minute 83, The away team have replaced Andrey Egorychev with Artem Shabolin. This is the fourth substitution made today by Yuriy Matveev.
Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Rostov needs to be cautious. Ural Yekaterinburg have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 86, Free kick for Rostov in their own half.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin awards Ural Yekaterinburg a goal kick.
Rostov have been awarded a corner by Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin.
Ural Yekaterinburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg at Rostov Arena.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Rostov awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Rostov in their own half.
Ural Yekaterinburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ural Yekaterinburg to take a throw-in in Rostov territory.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin blows to end the match. The final score is 1-0.
Ural Yekaterinburg's Vladimir Rykov has been booked in Rostov-on-Don.
